name: Glass Pyramid
description:
Can you build a 5 floors of pyramid with wine glasses?

Game was made for Godot Wild Jam #44 Theme was "Fragile" and I used "Boss theme intensifies - Add music that reacts to gameplay intensity" Wild Card.

Controls: Mouse only (and Escape key)

!!! For some reason the mouse keeps moving into right bottom corner if not in fullscreen. Please, play in fullscreen !!!
